long_description: The Lezyne Phone Caddy Bag is a highly versatile, lightweight and compact organizer designed to hold modern smartphones and ride essentials in a jersey, pocket, pack or on a belt. A seam welded, clear back panel is touchscreen compatible for providing access to the mobile device inside. Main compartment is divided and foam lined to hold personal items, most smartphones and mp3 players. An external port provides routing for headphones. Lightweight and water-resistant fabric guards against splashes and abuse. The external neoprene pockets are large enough to store a small multitool, tire repair, CO2 cartridges and an inflator (not included). The quick pull loop also serves as integrated belt loops.
short_description: The Lezyne Phone Caddy Bag is a highly versatile, lightweight and compact organizer designed to hold modern smartphones and ride essentials in a jersey, pocket, pack or on a belt.
